name: Sharon Monk
text: Best salads around. Everything else is great as well. Employees are always friendly

name: Laura Brentar
text: I watched the employees make good with no masks or gloves. One employee stuck her hand in toppings then touched raw dough. Not to mention the outfit the employees wore. I really loved their pizza until I saw this...

name: Joseph Hefler IV
text: Their pizza was delicious. The guy at the counter was extremely friendly and offered plates and napkins that came in handy. Would recommend trying them if you haven't.

name: john ceaser
text: great food sometimes thereâ€™s a wait but always worth it! unlike everyone else i understand thereâ€™s issues in food service it takes time to get to everyone!

name: Tracy Reed
text: Ordered a cheesy bread and a salad and waited over an hour and half for them to deliver the food without the sauces they needed. Called the manager (Shelby) to complain, and didn't even get an apology, just a bunch of excuses that they were â€¦More

name: Carrie willoughby
text: Love their pizza..could use a little more sauce

name: Alyssa Penkowski
text: Loved hungry Howie's when I lived in florida growing up, so glad to have one here as I've never seen them anywhere else but florida. I've loved everything ive tried.

name: Good Citizen
text: Worst Service. Cold pizza. Wrong order and the dough was tough on the pizza and the bread we ordered was burnt tough and soggy. Never will be back!

name: Anthony M
text: Their food is amazing, but even better service! 10x better over any other pizza place in Mentor.

name: Mark Douglas Obenour
text: Good Garlic crust.  Better than average for Hungry Howie's at this location.  I would order a pizza there again. ðŸ¥˜ðŸ˜Ž

name: ross wilkoff
text: This place donated an entire meal for the staff of Grand River Health and Rehab when one of our amazing family members tried to treat our staff. That Rocks!

name: Christopher Tashiro
text: A great pizza place overall. I ordered a couple sheets and the pizza was awesome and their garlic crust was some of the best I've had overall.

name: Dylan Reksten
text: I ordered a pizza 2 hours in advanced for delivery 5 minutes down the road for my lunch break and when I called they said that it might make it before we finish our lunch break this is not how you conduct buisness

name: Sherri Mills
text:
I am a frequent customer of the Mentor store, usually delivery and food is excellent, not so much today.
Delivery took over an hour and 10 min. Food was warm, but pizza dough did not â€¦More

name: Dylan Gridley
text: Great pizza super quick, what more could you want?!

name: Mister Tibbs
text: Been ordering from the Mentor Ohio store for some time now and never had a problem with the service nor quality.  The store manager is quick to call when the driver is a little behind do to my geographical location since I'm probably the farthest East that they go in Painesville.  Good food and professional staff.

name: Beth Parks
text: Food is good, but my credit card was charged more than the total I wrote in store. â€¦More

name: posisteve
text: great pizza and side items. order always correct and fresh. get the garlic seasoning

name: David Saarela Jr.
text: I order pizza from this location quite often. I always get good service and the pizza is always delicious. I'm a big fan of the flavored crusts that they offer.

name: Rachel Niewiadomski
text: Always have the best pizza and wings!

name: fast79z28camaro
text: Amazingly delicious. Hit the spot. Drunk.... Yes... But is amazing.  Eat here now.  Get cheesy bread.  Cajun... Yes.  Three more times yes. Pepperoni roll, do it, you won't regret it.  Get some marinara while you're at it.... Basically just eat everything... It's all good.  You're welcome ðŸ˜‰ cheers ðŸ¥‚

text: This is the best pizza around I can eat it hot or cold

name: Shawn H
text: Trying for the first time and away from home so I was skeptical.  Whole family loved the pizza. Taste excellent.  My new favorite.

name: Rachel Smith
text: Pizza wasn't that good, service was sub par. My pizza sat in the warmer while I stood there for 10 minutes.

text:

Staff friendly.

text: If youâ€™re gluten free... I highly recommend the gluten free pizza. It is amazing, not dense at all!!!! Pizza was delicious!!!

text: Really good pizza. The subs are my favorites. Delivery and takeout at this location.

name: Tom Slak
text: place order,  pick up order, go home and eat

name: Beagle
text: When I ordered a pizza for delivery, it arrived with all the toppings sloughed off to one side, half on and half off. Never again!

text: Flavored stuffed crust is the way to goo. ^

text: Pizza seemed as if it was microwaved cheese and sauce for completely separated from the crust and bottom of the pizza it was kind of weird like everything wanted to slide off pizza dough was thick and flavorless

text: Love the different crusts ..

text: Ordered a chicken barbecue pizza. All the toppings were on the side of the box. Apparently the driver sat it on his reclined seat.Recieved a refund but went without dinner. Thanks

text: I was really impressed.  Their pizza was quite tasty... And I didn't have to cook!

text: A tad bit overpriced compared to competitors but great customer service and delicious food.

text: I use this place very often, but I never iterated about the price but today I was shocked for three pizzas and Pepsi I paid almost $ 50.00 for the same thing I can buy at little Cesar for $ 30

text: The best calzone I've  had in a long time! Most definitely  will be back from  New York  for the food real soon! Plus the service  was wonderful,  keep up the great work  guys.

text: Hungry Howies is the best! Great experience every time I'm in there

text: Good food but a rip off.. ordered a Lg pizza, looked like a small. No lie

name: Anthony French
text: Chicken bacon ranch pizza on half and pepperoni on the other half. I get that the CBR comes with no sauce. But the whole pizza was left without. Went back to fix the problem and they said they dont give away free pizza and refused to refund it. Not even 2 slices were ate. Long time customer no more.

name: Stephanie Nock
text: Manager and staff were extremely rude and treated us like we were complete idiots.Tbey did not put any sauce on my pizza(not even the ranch that comes on the Chicken Bacon RANCH) and refused to remake it. We have been going to Hungry Howies for long time and now that there is new management we get treated Terrible.
